profileAlternative.name: Clay M. Thompson
profileAlternative.headline: Expert MATLAB consulting, machine learning, and iPhone software development
profileAlternative.summary: Custom MATLAB software development, machine learning, and consulting. I also specialize in custom iPhone and smart phone software.

aboutAlternative.text: Custom MATLAB software development, machine learning, and consulting. I also specialize in custom iPhone and smart phone software.

positions.title: Owner and MATLAB Consultant
positions.description: MATLAB consulting services by a MATLAB toolbox author and MATLAB expert. Services include machine learning, m-file performance optimization (speed-up), MATLAB GUI development and porting code to C/C++. I can also help with algorithm development, model building, image processing, finance and optimization.

positions.title: MATLAB Consultant
positions.description: Developing image processing, machine learning and software for an automated malaria diagnosis and quantitation system.

positions.title: MATLAB Consultant
positions.description: Developed machine learning algorithms, software and GUIs to discover new insights into tumor and tissue composition from visual and FTIR spectral images.

positions.title: Owner and Software Developer
positions.description:
Professional calculators for iPhone, Palm OS and Windows Mobile. Makers of MathU, MathU RPN, MathU 12D and MathU Pro.

I have created a set of advanced RPN calculators for mobile devices. The calculators are inspired by classic HP calculators and include a programmable model and a complex number calculator.
…
see more

positions.title: Member of Steering and Outreach Committees
positions.description:
This is a volunteer position in my community. Solarize Stanwood/Camano is a community project whose goal is to bring solar electric power to Stanwood and Camano WA. The approach is to partner with Northwest S.E.E.D, the local power company (Snohomish County PUD) and an installer to make it easy for residents to learn about and choose solar power for their homes and small businesses.

The steering committee mainly responsible for writing an RFP selecting an installer. The outreach committee is responsible to advertising and outreach including giving presentations all over the Island and in Stanwood.
…
see more

positions.title: Toolbox Author & Language Designer
positions.description:
Chief language designer for MATLAB 5.0 (the release of MATLAB that added multi-dimensional arrays, integer data types and object oriented programming). Added or updated hundreds of m-files within MATLAB.

Toolbox author:
Image Processing Toolbox 1.0
Control Toolbox 3.0

I also developed the MATLAB Runtime Server 1.0 (which later became the MATLAB Common Runtime)

given.text:
I have known Dr. Thompson for 10 years. There are few, if any, scientists who are as skilled computationally as Dr. Thompson. He is an exceptional programmer (especially for scientific or engineering applications), a capable engineer, and an exceptional human being. It is virtually impossible for me to sufficiently praise his technical skills or profound humanity.
